ygData.subject: Stray thought on SSL Certificates
ygData.msgSnippet: It just occurred to me that when we crawl https: sites, we may want to archive the server-side SSL certificates presented at crawl-time. - Gordon

It just occurred to me that when we crawl "https:" sites, we
may want to archive the server-side SSL certificates presented
at crawl-time. 

- Gordon
